Package Modele

Class Plateau

java.lang.Object
Modele.Plateau
public class Plateau
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Huu Khai NGUYEN (Alec)
Description: This class includes all methods that control the heart and the flow of program

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void ajouterCoordonneePossible​(int x, int y)
    (1)
    If player can add card to one position, add new possible position that player can choose for next turn Compare with list before (in possibilities[]) Compare with position of each card (in cartesJouees[]) Note that for each position that required by player, there are 4 possible options which can add to possibilities[]
    static void determinerFormeDuTapis​(java.util.ArrayList<Carte> cartesJouees)
    (5)
    If the variation of game is classic (Rectangle 5x3)
    + Reduce the selection of the card's table once you have determined the edge of the rectangle
    + Determine the shape of the final rectangle 5x3 base on cards played
    We determine this rectangle by its coordinates (x, y) Minimize zone of cards that can be put into table, Check with all possibilities defined if the position is available

  • Method Details

    • ajouterCoordonneePossible

      public static void ajouterCoordonneePossible​(int x, int y)
      (1)
      If player can add card to one position, add new possible position that player can choose for next turn
      • Compare with list before (in possibilities[])
      • Compare with position of each card (in cartesJouees[])
      Note that for each position that required by player, there are 4 possible options which can add to possibilities[]
      Parameters:
      x - : int
      y - : int

    • supprimerCoordonnee

      public static void supprimerCoordonnee​(int x, int y)
      (2)
      Remove coordinates that is similar in the list
      Parameters:
      x - : int
      y - : int

    • determinerFormeDuTapis

      public static void determinerFormeDuTapis​(java.util.ArrayList<Carte> cartesJouees)
      (5)
      If the variation of game is classic (Rectangle 5x3)
      + Reduce the selection of the card's table once you have determined the edge of the rectangle
      + Determine the shape of the final rectangle 5x3 base on cards played
      • We determine this rectangle by its coordinates (x, y)
      • Minimize zone of cards that can be put into table, Check with all possibilities defined if the position is available
      Parameters:
      cartesJouees - : List of cards in turn

      y - : int
      Returns:

    • misAJourListePossibilites

      public static void misAJourListePossibilites​(int x, int y)
      (9) Update list of possible positions for drawing a card to a position
      - (this method is used after moving (déplacer) a card in order to eliminate some possible position that is related to this card's position)

      y - : int
